feed.title: Proposal: soft-fork to make anyone-can-spend outputs unspendable for 100 blocks

entry.title: Proposal: soft-fork to make anyone-can-spend outputs unspendable for 100 blocks
entry.summary: The difficulty of obtaining payments as a bitcoin miner is high due to the complexity of the network. However, this does not apply to pool operators or those who buy hashing power from services such as GPUMAX. The latter may potentially exist again in the future.
